subject: Re: A few new webcam ITC images
author: psi_research
full_text:
I'm unable to view the images. There is a notation next to them that 
says "file not stored" so perhaps Yahoo's server doens't store them 
for long. I look forward to seeing some of your files. Thanks, Bill
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> Took me forever to get the webcam running right again so the video 
> wasnt choppy. I still have to get all my webcam software running 
correctly 
> so for now I was just using quickcam and sports video player to 
view 
> frame by frame.
>    
>   I asked them to help me test it and I had alot of fuzzy faces 
some of 
> which I saved in paintbrush (as usual) but they lost some of thier 
> color intensity. Not sure why yet. I still have to hammer that bug 
out. 
> They seemed eager to test as well and eventually a few clearer 
faces 
> started to come thru. It will take a while for me to stop messing 
with 
> settings and to get back on track but eventually I will.
>    
>   Enjoy.
>    
>   I will add them to the gallery later when I get time.
>    
>   Misty
>    
> 
>  		
> ---------------------------------
> How low will we go? Check out Yahoo! Messenger's low  PC-to-Phone 
call rates.
>
